title: Accessibility Suite
creator: Online ADA
description: The Accessibility Suite plugin audits websites for WCAG / Section 508 accessibility issues. It scans images, posts, pages, and objects on a website and pinpoints exact code elements that are out of compliance. Developers can use detailed reports to update their website and set up recurring scans.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
